attributes.action: Speed bumps & speed cameras on Abingdon Road , Walton , Liverpool
attributes.background: To many people speed on our road , we want speed bumps / speed cameras as 2 people have died in past 2 years a child & a elderly man & few been hurt , they use are road as a formula 1 race track,this  has been going on for over 30 years now , enough is enough , we want something done about it now

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local roads are a matter for your local council, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
